str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.

word: [ their objections ] were put to rest,
parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From the same as hesuchios; to keep still, i.e. Refrain from labor, meddlesomeness or speech.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To glorify, honor, bestow glory on. From doxa; to render glorious.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
Then, therefore, since. Probably from airo; a particle denoting an inference more or less decisive.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Probably from etho; a race, i.e. A tribe; specially, a foreign one.
From metanoeo; compunction; by implication, reversal (another's) decision).
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
Life, both of physical (present) and of spiritual (particularly future) existence. From zao; life.
